title: GTT Wins Telecommunications Company of the Year
text:
Companies mentioned in this article: GTT Communications, Inc. 
MCLEAN, Va. -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- GTT Communications, Inc. (NYSE: GTT), the leading global cloud networking provider to multinational clients, announced today that it received the Gold Stevie® Award for Company of the Year – Telecommunications in the 2015 International Business Awards. 
“We are honored to be recognized as Telecommunications Company of the Year by the International Business Awards,” said Rick Calder, GTT President and CEO. “This award reflects the hard work and dedication of all GTT employees. We are successfully executing our strategy to expand cloud networking services to multinational clients, to extend worldwide secure network connectivity and to deliver outstanding client experience by living our core values of simplicity, speed and agility.” 
The International Business Awards is the premier global business awards program. The judges selected this year’s winners from a record pool of more than 3,700 entrees across 60 nations. Submissions came from organizations of all sizes across virtually every industry. More than 200 executives worldwide participated in the judging process. 
“Winning Telecommunications Company of the Year is further validation of GTT’s successful growth strategy,” said Mike Sicoli, GTT Chief Financial Officer. “This year we acquired MegaPath’s managed services business and completed the integration while continuing to drive results from our organic growth initiatives. GTT recently announced the acquisition of One Source Networks (OSN). The agreement expands GTT’s cloud networking services and worldwide network reach. Upon closing the OSN transaction, GTT will achieve its previously announced next financial objectives of $400 million in revenue and $100 million in Adjusted EBITDA.” 
About GTT 
GTT’s global Tier1 IP network connects to any location in the world and with any application in the cloud. Our cloud networking services provide a better way for multinational clients to reach the cloud. Clients trust us to deliver secure solutions with simplicity, speed and agility.
